title: USA TODAY Partners with Brand Film Festival for Second Year to Name Top Viral Film
text:
CLOSE

Today, USA TODAY launched a poll for its audience to again choose their favorite viral film of the year in a partnership with Brand Film Festival.

Beginning today and running, through Friday, April 12th, readers can watch three submitted brand films and choose their favorite to be awarded USA TODAY’s Audience Award for Top Viral Film.

Brand Film Festival, in its fourth year, continues to showcase the most artistic, creative and effective branded content films, from YouTube videos to long-form documentaries. The awards event on May 2nd, will bring together and honor marketing storytellers and reward brands, agencies, and those leading the way in branded films.

The short list provided to USA TODAY received high scores by its jury, which is comprised of top creatives from the worlds of advertising, digital, production, PR, films, and media. The 2019 Brand Film Festival jury is chaired by Sandra Howard, Vice President, Corporate Brand Marketing at AT&T.

The winner will be announced on May 2rd at the Brand Film Festival in New York City.

To cast your ballot, watch the films and vote at brandfilmfestival.usatoday.com. For more information Brand Film Festival, click here.
